Rulings.Edison: ● If one target leaves the GY before this resolves, the other is still returned to the hand.

Rulings.Goat:
●Salvage targets 2 WATER monsters in the GY.
●If 1 of the targeted WATER monsters is removed from the GY by an effect chained to Salvage, the remaining WATER monster is still added to your hand.
